message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $950,000. I believe this reflects its worth while acknowledging your interest.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value you place on the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $700,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your desire to work within a budget, however, $700,000 significantly undervalues the product's true worth. I could consider letting it go for $890,000. This feels like a fair compromise that acknowledges the value it brings.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I understand the value of the product, I am still looking to keep my expenses within my budget. Would it be possible to consider an offer closer to $800,000? I believe this would be a fair compromise for both of us.
